# Kite Connect Trading App - Project Instructions

This is a Kite Connect trading application with React.js frontend and Node.js backend for authentication and historical data fetching.

## Project Structure
- **Backend**: Node.js/Express (Port 3001)
- **Frontend**: React.js (Port 4000)
- **Integration**: Kite Connect API for authentication and trading data

## Checklist Progress

## Development Guidelines
- Use environment variables for sensitive API credentials
- Implement proper CORS configuration
- Follow security best practices (never expose API secrets to frontend)
- Implement proper error handling and validation
